p: Although hMPV generally has a self-limiting course in the general population, severe disease and fatal outcomes have been reported, especially in HSCT patients; notably, co-morbidities make establishing the clear cause of the fatal outcome difficult [ 2]. Compared to other viruses, hMPV infection has been found in most patients but its role in causing symptoms does not seem very crucial; nonetheless, it is not a negligible infection [ 11].
